messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~J1(3.0)}Tell me everything you know.{~N}What's going on?
{~J1(4.0)}What are you talking about?{~N}I don't understand a word of this.{~E}
{~J0(5.3)}The other church in this town.{~N}That is your destination.
{~J0(6.5)}This is beyond my abilities.{~N}Only you can stop it now.{~E}
{~J0(5.0)}Have you not seen{~N}the crest marked{~N}on the ground all over town?
{~J0(3.2)}So that's what I saw{~N}in the schoolyard.
The elevator doesn't{~N}appear to be working.{~E}
There is an {~C2}Antique shop key{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
These are phones and phonebooks.{~N}No need to examine this.{~E}
I'll copy the location of{~N}the antique shop to the map.{~E}
There's a vending machine.{~N}It doesn't work.{~E}
There's a white board.{~N}Nothing special written here.{~E}
The phone's out.{~N}Can't get a dial tone.{~E}
